name: Story in April
body:
# Intro

Welcome to my blog which was built for fun. It was my first time to use Github and apply web coding to generate a personal website. Therefore, it is actually a test website that need tons of development from time to time.  

# Bio

My name is Chengliang Deng, orginally from China and now a business undergraduate in Vancouver with passion for information systems and web technology application. After June this year, I am officially graduated and seek for an opportunity to be a Junior Business Anaylst.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
